item.description:
Lets try to get the Downtown Nashua Night Out events started again. There is a lot of interesting nightlife to be enjoyed in our own backyard. We will start with Comedy on Purpose w/ Alana Susko. This happens in the basement of Fody's and starts at 8:00 PM sharp and lasts until 10 PM.

Price: $5.00

I don't have details yet on how to purchase the tickets.

About Fody's Tavern:
Come in, sit down and enjoy our classy, relaxed tavern atmosphere in downtown Nashua, NH. Our food is nothing short of mouthwatering. We look forward to meeting you in our fine restaurant!

Fody's Tavern features Live Music every Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday. Our cozy restaurant also promotes regular Comedy shows and special events.

Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...

Drink Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Nashua Night Out - Comedy on Purpose
